title: Extremes of Violet 0-2 (BlackOut 1995) (Talon-Novus) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 3 Issues

Extremes of Violet #0-2
Publisher:  Blackout Comics
Publication Date:  1995

Writers:  Bruce Schoengood (#0) and William Marden (#1-2)
Pencilers:  Dell Barras (#0) and Jake Jacobsen (#1-2)
Inkers:  Dell Barras (#0) and Dave Gutierrez (#1-2)
Colorists:  Barry Gregory (#0), Fred Galpern (#1-1), and Ryan Lesser (#2)
Letterer:  Bradley Sean
Cover Artists:  Dell Barras and Bob Berry (#0) and Jake Jacobsen and Dave Gutierrez (#1-2)

Extremes of Violet is the story of one of the most beautiful and dangerous - not to mention mysterious - women walking the Earth today!

Potentially immortal, having traveled the globe for more than three centuries fighting and loving in every corner of the world, Violet slept through the decades following the Second World War in a strange coma.

Now working for U.S. Intelligence, she has gone undercover to penetrate what appears to be a mere gem smuggling operation.

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
